alert.note: Alert for Lower Plaquemines (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 12:08PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Plaquemines Parish through 1245 PM CDT... At 1207 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing funnel clouds near Port Sulphur, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds, winds in excess of 30 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...If a funnel cloud briefly touches down, minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Port Sulphur, Empire and Buras-triumph. FUNNEL CLOUDS...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
